titleStmt.title: A new catichisme for ever: or, The mite of a minister Cast into a catechisme, for the preparation of his people, before they receive the supper of the Lord. By Joshuah Siston, minister at Grauby, in the vale of Bever.
titleStmt.author: Siston, Joshua, b. 1603 or 4.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Francis Coles, at the signe of the Half-bowle in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: Title page has date written in MS.: feb: 19 1650. The printed date, 1651, has been crossed out and replaced with "1650".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Half-bowle in the Old-Baily
